Class KnowledgeRepository

  • java.lang.Object
    • cz.cuni.mff.d3s.deeco.knowledge.KnowledgeRepository

    IKnowledgeRepository
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    LocalKnowledgeRepository, TSKnowledgeRepository

    public abstract class KnowledgeRepository
extends java.lang.Object
implements IKnowledgeRepository
    An abstract class specifing and defining basic operations on the knowledge repository.
    Author:
    Michal Kit
